definition: to close/to stop/to put a stop to sth/cut-off point/stopping point/deadline
to cut off (a length)/to stop/to intercept/section/chunk/length

sentences.english: However, she started to write her essay only one day before the deadline.
sentences.chinese: 然而，她临到截止日期的前一天才开始动笔。

sentences.english: Thru Date is required in order to Forecast Payable Time.
sentences.chinese: 需要指定截止日期来预测计薪时间。

sentences.english: Participants must not discuss the problems with others before the deadline for solution submission.
sentences.chinese: 参赛者在截止日期之前不能和其他人讨论赛题。

sentences.english: Edward always gets heebie jeebies from deadlines.
sentences.chinese: 爱德华总是对截止日期神经过敏。

sentences.english: When did he return the book to the library?
sentences.chinese: 从图书馆借出来的书都盖上了归还的截止日期。

sentences.english: The deadline for submissions of WPA section and zonal symposia, oral communications, and posters is November 30.
sentences.chinese: 通讯口头提交意见书的截止日期是11月30日。

sentences.english: Salaries have been distributed to every worker up to yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 截止到昨天，工资已经全部发付到位。

sentences.english: Regular style globe valves are suitable for moderate throttling applications.
sentences.chinese: 一般的截止阀适合用于适度的节流应用。

sentences.english: The ultimatum expires at noon tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 最后通牒规定的期限到明天中午截止。

sentences.english: Case write-ups are to be submitted to the T. A. before the class when they are due.
sentences.chinese: 案例文章应在截止日上课之前递交助教。

sentences.english: As to auroral hiss, there are upper and lower frequency cut-offs.
sentences.chinese: 极光嘶声则有明显的上截止频率和下截止频率。

sentences.english: As to auroral hiss, there are upper and lower frequency cut-offs.
sentences.chinese: 极光嘶声则有明显的上截止频率和下截止频率。

sentences.english: Responses to the sources-sought notice are due June 6.
sentences.chinese: 对来源搜索通告的响应截止6月6日。

sentences.english: So far, the hoaxers haven't been able to copy all these features.
sentences.chinese: 截止现在，那些骗子们还不能复制所有的这些特点。

sentences.english: The higher the volume of the sedimented gluten, the better should be the baking quality of the flour.
sentences.chinese: 沉积的面筋量越多，该面粉的焙烤特性截止好。

sentences.english: When the characteristic odour of gas can be smelled, close the cut-off cock.
sentences.chinese: 当闻到这种气体特殊的气味，关闭截止阀。

definition: (of a publisher) to send a manuscript off to the printer/(of a journalist) to send a dispatch
extent of a rise (in prices etc)/amount of increase/growth (typically expressed as a percentage)
near in time/in the near future/very soon/recent
to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent
(of a newspaper) to stop accepting incoming articles
